titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Robert Minor Photographs PHOTOS.233
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by David Olson

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-03-07T16:35-0500

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

did.abstract: Robert Minor was a cartoonist, journalist, and prominent member of the Communist Party of the United States of America. The collection contains two photographs. One photograph depicts Antonio Lombardo, and the other appears to be Robert Minor.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the:
Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Elmer Holmes Bobst Library
70 Washington Square South
New York, NY 10012
Phone: (212) 998-2630
Fax: (212) 995-4225
E-mail: tamiment.wagner@library.nyu.edu

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Robert Minor Photographs; PHOTOS 233; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains two photographs. One photograph is signed, "To Comrade 'Bob' Minor, for whom I have the highest revolutionary regard. From, Antonio Lombardo." The other photograph is not labeled, but appears to be Minor himself.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Materials
relatedmaterial.p: The Robert Minor papers are held by Columbia University Libraries.

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: In 2013, the collection was rehoused and folder title was transcribed.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Robert Minor was a cartoonist, journalist, and prominent member of the Communist Party of the United States of America.
